boardgame.name: The Dragon _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Flagon
boardgame.description: The Dragon _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Flagon is a tavern world-renowned for its most magical drink, The Dragon. Legend has it that one sip of The Dragon can give a hero wondrous abilities beyond their wildest dreams _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; but with a tavern full of thirsty adventurers and only one flagon left, things are bound to go wrong. Prepare your magic and grab your weapon because there's only one true objective in this brawl _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and it's not just a sip of The Dragon. Only one can win and emerge with the reputation as the greatest fighter ever seen within the walls of The Dragon _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Flagon!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Dragon _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Flagon is a game of chaos and mayhem for 2-8 players. Throw mugs, smash chairs, swing from the chandelier, sip from the legendary Dragon Flagon, cast spells, and pull the rug out from under your fellow adventurers as you attempt to build up your reputation and win the day!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Play as one of nine unique characters in a 3D tavern environment that can be set up differently every time. Multiple play modes add even more variety._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Will you leave with the greatest reputation from The Dragon _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Flagon?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This game has been punched and played 4 times. All components are present. I am selling the game because my friends think it is a kids game. While I generally like the game, it will not hit the table much and I need to make room for other games. I will ship in USA using USPS from zip code of 14216. I will send it as cheaply as possible. Do not ask for a shipping estimate. I am not making two trips to the Post Office. Once you place your order I will get the shipping estimate and send it to you. I will send it elsewhere in the world, but do not expect the shipping to be cheap. In my experience sending things to the Pacific (Asia) seems to be more expensive than Europe. Note: If you make an order and do not pay me and then fail to contact me as to why you have not paid me, I will give you a negative rating. I am taking the time to go to the post office and get you an estimate. I am sending the game as cheaply as possible. Please be an honest buyer.
